name: SteamTests
enabledTests: SteamFriendFlags.ConvertSteamFriendFlagsToBitfield.Should return only None when bitfield is 0
SteamFriendFlags.ConvertSteamFriendFlagsToBitfield.Should return Steam's All when the All flag is enabled
SteamFriendFlags.ConvertSteamFriendFlagsToBitfield.Should return valid value when mixing multiple flags
SteamUserRestrictions.Convert Bitfield to Set<SteamUserRestriction>.Should convert correctly when two flags are enabled
SteamUserRestrictions.Convert Bitfield to Set<SteamUserRestriction>.Should return only None when bitfield is 0
SteamUserRestrictions.Convert Set<SteamUserRestriction> to bitfield.Should return 0 when Set has None
SteamUserRestrictions.Convert Set<SteamUserRestriction> to bitfield.Should return valid when flags are set
